post:
Hello guys, probably my first thread here ever since I joined.

I got a dedicated server with ESXI installed.

It came with 8 ip addresses packaged with it, I only needed 3 for three VPS units I was using for a particular project.

In connection to this, I was thinking of selling 5 little VPS units, unmanaged, just for the sake of sharing the cost, and so, I wish to know where these specs will be good enough:

-------------
$4.99/Month
1 IP address
128MB Ram
100Mbps port
50gb HDD
-------------

I will be happy for suggestions.

Location: Denver, USA

edited to add server location - thanks to Spirit's advice.
